text:
Alfredo G. Marañon Jr. (December 21, 1935 – October 1, 2020) was a Filipino PDP–Laban politician. He was Governor of Negros Occidental from 2010 to 2019. He was Mayor of Sagay City between 2001 to 2010. Marañon was born in Sagay City.
Marañon died on October 1, 2020 in Bacolod, Philippines from heart disease, aged 84.
